channel.title: CreativeScape goes Live!
channel.description:
[img]http://img43.imageshack.us/img43/2578/csanimatedbanner2.gif[/img] [url=http://creative-scape.net][b]Creative-Scape.net[/b][/url] | [url=http://creative-scape.net/client][b]Browser Client[/b][/url] | [url=http://creative-scape.net/download][b]Download Client[/b][/url]
[b]Introduction[/b] First of all, welcome to our advertisement topic! We hope this topic will be good enough for you to come and test our amazing server itself. :) CreativeScape is a RuneScape Private Server, which brings you back to old school roots. This server is easy to play and it's very fun, compared with other servers out there. But it has a lot of difficult challenges to keep players attracted by every single second. Since server name is CreativeScape, it also is creative with it own custom quests and own story.
[b]Features[/b] - Great Economy. You can earn money by doing every single skill. - Every single skill is trainable. Total of twenty-one to choose from. - Custom, but decent Quests. Total of four to choose from. - Great combat system and triangle, which is quite important between danger zone users. - Easy usable teleporting by emotion tab and commands, like it used to be on classic private server. - More then twenty custom Treasure Trail tasks. Start them by killing monsters and finding your own clue scrolls. - Well coded chatting system. Ability to turn your chat offline or 'friends only' and guests will see you offline. Very useful for known people, who doesn't want to be disturbed. - Very creative home area. A lot of features can be found right there. - Online browser client, for people that don't want to download a browser client. - Deskop clients also are available, for people that doesn't want to play from browsers. - HighScores to battle for best ranks and titles, automatically updated every three hours. - Player killing table, which lists our server Top 100 best player killers. - Monthly community events and wars between player made clans. - Great and respectful administrators, who doesn't spawn or cheat, but play fairly as other players. - Friendly, nice community and amazing moderators.
[img]http://img37.imageshack.us/img37/562/homepaged.png[/img] [img]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/7389/webclient.png[/img] [img]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/3520/highscoress.png[/img] [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/7064/dropparty.png[/img] [img]http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/2585/woodcuttingv.png[/img] [img]http://img849.imageshack.us/img849/5485/screenshot004we.png[/img] [img]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/8963/slayerc.png[/img] [img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/2880/pk2d.png[/img] [img]http://img715.imageshack.us/img715/8014/edgevillepk.png[/img] [img]http://img864.imageshack.us/img864/7238/pk1d.png[/img] [img]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/3306/magebankwar.png[/img] [img]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/8466/stalls.png[/img] [img]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/8355/screenshot001xj.png[/img] [img]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/7428/questke.png[/img] [img]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/9573/steeldragons.png[/img]
> [url=http://creative-scape.net][b]www.Creative-Scape.net[/b][/url]

item.title: CreativeScape goes Live!
item.dc:creator: @dries3s dries3s
item.description:
@dries3s wrote:

[center]Hello everyone,

Today we see the release of a dungeon expansion Nikki has been working on for a few weeks. This dungeon consists of chaos druids that drop herbs, some new red dragons and a few other lower level monsters for people to train on.

To get there you head north of ::hills and follow the path around, there are several paths leading to different monsters, so get exploring!

Many more is yet to come, so keep an eye out for all of these!

Join now!

~CreativeScape Staff~

www.creative-scape.net
www.creative-scape.net/forums[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: CreativeScape goes Live!
item.dc:creator: @Eletrics96 Eletrics96
item.description:
@Eletrics96 wrote:

[center][/center]

Hey guys, here comes the long waited update. Purpose of this update was to make the combat triangle like it used to be in old rs era… New rs has gone too far boosting bonuses sky-high and basically ruining the concept of combat triangle and skill involved into fighting. In other words, we are moving off from “luck” over “skill”, e.g. taking away strength of dudes who buys expensive gears and are supposed to be best pkers. Pking is more than just high hits. It’s a skill. Techniques. Hope You enjoy this update.

What is combat triangle? Basically, the concept stands as, melee being good defense, but it’s weak against magics. And magicks is weak versus ranging, as they have poor defence. (before this update, magic was the weak link of triangle, melee was absolute dominant and ranging was somewhere between). Range strength is its speed. Magics are suppose to hit high and often. And melee is melee.

Along with this update, your account defense system will have more impact and melee (attack) would be less accurate, but more accurate if you do have none. Magic will hit more often and “accurate”, but will froze you less, so there do be a fair fight. Ranging has been adjusted a lot too. We have tested it a lot, thinking of a perfect balance. I love it. Test it by your own.

Read full topic

item.title: CreativeScape goes Live!
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

You’ll VERY rarely see me say this, but this server is very cool. Only an hour or so in the game and I can’t get enough. Haven’t been bothered by some game-breaking bug, not overwhelmed by pay-to-win fag’s trying to seem cool all over the place, and there’s actually stuff to do other than PK. Reasonable XP rates, good job guys. Nice to see someone has their shit straight. Some of the features are mainstream, multiple other servers have these, but they’re all broke as shit.

Read full topic

item.title: CreativeScape goes Live!
item.dc:creator: @N3v5 N3v5
item.description:
@N3v5 wrote:

Here’s a list of the most recent updates and fixes added to CreativeScape. Stay updated with content updates and what’s going on in-game by joining our [URL=http://“http://creative-scape.net/forums/”]Community Forums[/URL], lots more updates to come.

[ul][]Rabbit foot has been added to mboxes. It has 250 uses and a it loses a use every time you receive a nest. The chance of receiving extra nests is the same as lumberjack (does not stack) of around 10%. These nests also have a 10% increase to contain red eggs instead of seeds.
[]Reset commands have been removed and an item has been added to the vote store for the previous 3 vote tokens. These reset scrolls are tradeable and will reset any skill, not just combat.
[]For premium members, Party Pete now sells a bank upgrade scroll for 10m each. This gives an extra 10 slots to your bank, up to a limit of + 140 slots.
[]Super combats can now be made by using eggs on potions aswell as potions on potions.
[]Some skill interfaces have been updated to show the newer additions to the game. These are being updated over time.
[]Potions now show their ingredients on the herblore page.
[]A bug with the rockcake that caused you to take damage with a ring of recoil has been fixed.
[]Player chatboxes should no longer miss out messages if you type too quickly.
[]The “Game” option now has an off toggle.
[]Missing requirements on several items have been fixed.
[]The sickness now requires a defence level of 20 to use.
[]The ignore list should save and send on login.
[]HP now refills after every level up instead of just giving you +1hp.
[]Equipping a weapon will no longer close the stat screen.
[]Jad/other NPCs being invisible should now be fixed.
[]The 1 step rule when teleporting in the wilderness has been removed and replaced by a 5 second timer. Now you can be attacked and teleport out if you make a mistake.
[]The “Castle” teleport (dangerous) has been renamed to “Dark PK”
[]PMs will no longer be sent if someone is on your ignore list or your PM is off/friends. This means tab to reply should only reply to the last message you can read.
[*]There are also huge changes in the works with regards to combat being tested on the beta atm for balance. These updates will make pking a lot better and make fights require more skill than pure numbers when fighting.[/ul]

[CENTER]We hope to see you in-game! ~[I]Creativescape Team[/I]
[URL=http://“http://creative-scape.net/forums/”]http://creative-scape.net/forums/[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://Creative-scape.net/download”]http://Creative-scape.net/download[/URL][/CENTER]

Read full topic

item.title: CreativeScape goes Live!
item.dc:creator: @dries3s dries3s
item.description:
@dries3s wrote:

Hello everyone,

We’ve been stuffed with alot of updates recently!

The rogue set has been added to the store.
The golden needle has been added to the store
The needle gives a 7% xp bonus as with all gold items
It also has a 1/50 chance of not using any hides while making an item
You can now make canoes at the canoe station east of Edgeville (over the bridge) to take you to the level 37 wilderness, west of The Adversary.

[I]For more, check out =>
www.creative-scape.net/forums
www.creative-scape.net/download
Pay a visit aswell to our youtube channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCymYeVQW8ShrIAQN860ykLA[/I]

Read full topic
